rooms.description: Large entrance hall with a vestibule and coat room, providing a welcoming entry and good Vastu alignment for the front door.

Spacious living-dining area adjacent to the garden view; designed with large windows facing east for morning sunlight. The layout promotes family interaction and adheres to Vastu by having a clear entrance and main space in the south-east.
A generously sized master bedroom with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet. Placed in the north-west zone for positive energy flow and privacy.
Comfortable guest room with en-suite bathroom; situated on the south-east side to balance family space and adhere to Vastu guidelines.
Additional guest bedroom ensuring adequate privacy; allocated in the north-west quadrant for balanced energy distribution.
Modern kitchen with open layout connecting to dining area. Vastu-compliant placement on the south-east side ensures prosperity and positive vibrations, with adequate ventilation.
Functional utility room for laundry and storage; located in the northeast zone to maintain cleanliness and order.

openings.description: The main entrance is aligned with Vastu principles, facing south for auspicious energy flow.
Strategically placed windows to enhance natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Balcony offering a view towards the garden, ensuring fresh air and relaxation zone.
Secondary entrance for service staff with easy access to utility areas.
